name: fsl_ents
description: Extract component time series from a MELODIC .ica directory

inputs.name: .ica directory
inputs.description: .ica directory to extract time series from

inputs.name: Components
inputs.description: Component number or FIX/AROMA file specifying components to extract

inputs.name: Output file
inputs.description: File to save time series to

inputs.name: Overwrite output
inputs.description: Overwrite output file if it exists

inputs.name: Extra configuration file
inputs.description: Extra files to append to output file

output-files.name: Output Time Series File
output-files.description: File to save time series to
